meanings.sent1: The small, fluffy bunny was unthreatening to the children at the petting zoo.
meanings.sent2: The colorful flowers in the garden created an unthreatening atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The unthreatening squirrel stole a peanut from the picnic basket, much to the amusement of the family.
meanings.sent4: The gentle breeze whispered through the trees, carrying an unthreatening presence.
meanings.sent5: The cozy, unthreatening glow of the nightlight helped the child feel safe and secure.

meanings.definition: Not likely to harm or endanger.
meanings.sent1: The friendly dog was unthreatening towards the mail carrier.
meanings.sent2: The clear path through the forest seemed unthreatening to the hikers.
meanings.sent3: The unthreatening kitten pounced playfully on a ball of yarn, causing no harm.
meanings.sent4: The soothing music filled the room with an unthreatening presence, calming everyone down.
meanings.sent5: The warm, unthreatening smile of the lifeguard reassured the swimmers in the pool.
